text: Blabicentrus capixaba is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1998. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Blabicentrus capixaba. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1998
title: Blabicentrus capixaba
